edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Actor
      • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends Actor
    Projectiles are actors that can be thrown from the hero's location in order to remove enemies. Note that there is no public interface to this file. Projectiles should be controlled via ProjectilePool.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.lehigh.cse.lol.Actor

      • render

        public void render(SpriteBatch sb,
                   float delta)
        When drawing a projectile, we first check if it is too far from its starting point. We only draw it if it is not.
